name: Behemoth
description:
'''Behemoth''' is a Polish [[blackened death metal]] band from [[Gda≈Ñsk]], formed in 1991. They are considered to have played an important role in establishing the Polish [[extreme metal]] underground with [[Vader (band)|Vader]] and [[Hate (band)|Hate]].

Behemoth have been referred to as "a leading light in the [[Polish metal]] scene." The band's releases have received acclaim from major publications. In 2016, the staff of ''[[Loudwire]]'' named them the 50th-best metal band of all time.
